00022 #ifndef VALIDATION_RMSE_TERMINATION_HPP_INCLUDED

00025 #include <mlpack/core.hpp>
00026 
00027 namespace mlpack
00028 {
00029 namespace amf
00030 {
00031 template <class MatType>
00032 class ValidationRMSETermination
00033 {
00034  public:
00035   ValidationRMSETermination(MatType& V,
00036                             size_t num_test_points,
00037                             double tolerance = 1e-5,
00038                             size_t maxIterations = 10000,
00039                             size_t reverseStepTolerance = 3)
00040         : tolerance(tolerance),
00041           maxIterations(maxIterations),
00042           num_test_points(num_test_points),
00043           reverseStepTolerance(reverseStepTolerance)
00044   {
00045     size_t n = V.n_rows;
00046     size_t m = V.n_cols;
00047 
00048     test_points.zeros(num_test_points, 3);
00049 
00050     for(size_t i = 0; i < num_test_points; i++)
00051     {
00052       double t_val;
00053       size_t t_row;
00054       size_t t_col;
00055       do
00056       {
00057         t_row = rand() % n;
00058         t_col = rand() % m;
00059       } while((t_val = V(t_row, t_col)) == 0);
00060 
00061       test_points(i, 0) = t_row;
00062       test_points(i, 1) = t_col;
00063       test_points(i, 2) = t_val;
00064       V(t_row, t_col) = 0;
00065     }
00066   }
00067 
00068   void Initialize(const MatType& /* V */)
00069   {
00070     iteration = 1;
00071 
00072     rmse = DBL_MAX;
00073     rmseOld = DBL_MAX;
00074 
00075     c_index = 0;
00076     c_indexOld = 0;
00077 
00078     reverseStepCount = 0;
00079     isCopy = false;
00080   }
00081 
00082   bool IsConverged(arma::mat& W, arma::mat& H)
00083   {
00084     // Calculate norm of WH after each iteration.
00085     arma::mat WH;
00086 
00087     WH = W * H;
00088 
00089     if (iteration != 0)
00090     {
00091       rmseOld = rmse;
00092       rmse = 0;
00093       for(size_t i = 0; i < num_test_points; i++)
00094       {
00095         size_t t_row = test_points(i, 0);
00096         size_t t_col = test_points(i, 1);
00097         double t_val = test_points(i, 2);
00098         double temp = (t_val - WH(t_row, t_col));
00099         temp *= temp;
00100         rmse += temp;
00101       }
00102       rmse /= num_test_points;
00103       rmse = sqrt(rmse);
00104     }
00105 
00106     iteration++;
00107   
00108     if((rmseOld - rmse) / rmseOld < tolerance && iteration > 4)
00109     {
00110       if(reverseStepCount == 0 && isCopy == false)
00111       {
00112         isCopy = true;
00113         this->W = W;
00114         this->H = H;
00115         c_indexOld = rmseOld;
00116         c_index = rmse;
00117       }
00118       reverseStepCount++;
00119     }
00120     else
00121     {
00122       reverseStepCount = 0;
00123       if(rmse <= c_indexOld && isCopy == true)
00124       {
00125         isCopy = false;
00126       }
00127     }
00128 
00129     if(reverseStepCount == reverseStepTolerance || iteration > maxIterations)
00130     {
00131       if(isCopy)
00132       {
00133         W = this->W;
00134         H = this->H;
00135         rmse = c_index;
00136       }
00137       return true;
00138     }
00139     else return false;
00140   }
00141   
00142   const double& Index() { return rmse; }
00143 
00144   const size_t& Iteration() { return iteration; }
00145   
00146   const size_t& MaxIterations() { return maxIterations; }
00147 
00148  private:
00149   double tolerance;
00150   size_t maxIterations;
00151   size_t num_test_points;
00152   size_t iteration;
00153 
00154   arma::Mat<double> test_points;
00155 
00156   double rmseOld;
00157   double rmse;
00158 
00159   size_t reverseStepTolerance;
00160   size_t reverseStepCount;
00161   
00162   bool isCopy;
00163   arma::mat W;
00164   arma::mat H;
00165   double c_indexOld;
00166   double c_index;
00167 };
